comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - using command line example from BIRT runtime package
   - type in "genReport --mode runrender Sample(usingXMLDS).rptdesign"

expected behavior:

   - the html report is created without any error printed in console

actual behavior: 

   - the html report was created with exceptions thrown out in console
